scripts.postinit: node .bin/index css2scss && node .bin/index install && npm run init:extras
scripts.init:extras: cd $npm_package_config_project && pwd && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.presetup: echo "Warning: may need to update this script from time to time"
scripts.cra:all: npx -y npm-run-all cra:legacy cra:v16 cra:v17 cra:v18
scripts.cra:legacy: mkdir wsk-cra-legacy-app && cd wsk-cra-legacy-app && npm init -y && npm i react@16.7 react-dom@16.7
scripts.precra:legacy:extras: node .bin/index cra legacy wsk-cra-legacy-app && cd wsk-cra-legacy-app && npm i
scripts.cra:legacy:extras: node .bin/index link && cd wsk-cra-legacy-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.cra:v16: mkdir wsk-cra-v16-app && cd wsk-cra-v16-app && npm init -y && npm i react@16 react-dom@16
scripts.precra:v16:extras: node .bin/index cra v16 wsk-cra-v16-app && cd wsk-cra-v16-app && npm i
scripts.cra:v16:extras: node .bin/index link && cd wsk-cra-v16-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.cra:v17: mkdir wsk-cra-v17-app && cd wsk-cra-v17-app && npm init -y && npm i react@16 react-dom@16
scripts.precra:v17:extras: node .bin/index cra v17 wsk-cra-v17-app && cd wsk-cra-v17-app && npm i
scripts.cra:v17:extras: node .bin/index link && cd wsk-cra-v17-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.cra:v18: mkdir wsk-cra-v18-app && cd wsk-cra-v18-app && npm init -y && npm i react@16 react-dom@16
scripts.precra:v18:extras: node .bin/index cra v18 wsk-cra-v18-app && cd wsk-cra-v18-app && npm i
scripts.cra:v18:extras: node .bin/index link && cd wsk-cra-v18-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.postvite: node .bin/index css2scss $npm_package_config_project/src && npx -y ncp ./.tmp/vite ./$npm_package_config_project && npm run vite:install
scripts.vite:all: npx -y npm-run-all vite:v5 vite:v4 vite:v3 vite:v2 vite:legacy
